step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move overhead.
Great job stretching your arms overhead with fingers open. Ensure your shoulders are relaxed.
Well done making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing. Keep up the good work.
This step is not defined in the exercise instructions. Please focus on the defined steps.
Good job on the second rep's starting position. Remember to keep your arms relaxed and fingers open.
Nicely done stretching your arms overhead with fingers open. Try to relax your shoulders a bit more.
Excellent form making a fist and squeezing shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Great job extending your arms overhead while exhaling and relaxing. Keep your movements smooth.
This step is not defined in the exercise instructions. Please focus on the defined steps.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms stretched overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades together as you inhale. Finally, stretch your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
